name: Java Dungeon RPG
description:
Java Dungeon RPG is an experimental prototype game, developed using Java Libgdx. It currently features a full fledged inventory and equipment system, turn-based battle and random enemy movement.

Hope you enjoy playing my small demo! feel free to support me if you're interested in having Java Dungeon RPG as a full game

Controls:

- Arrow Keys to move

- Hit 'Space bar' to open chests

- 'A' button to toggle Weapons equipment

- 'S' button to toggle Armors equipment

- 'D' button to toggle Shields equipment

- 'W' button to toggle Items equipment

- 'Q' to use selected Item

- 'R' to restart the game

- 'N' to zoom out the main game camera

- 'B' to Zoom in the main game Camera
